revised_title: Iguanodon and Hylaeosaurus Osteology: Additional Observations
tldr: This article presents additional observations on the osteology of the Iguanodon and Hylaeosaurus, focusing on the structure of their spinal column, pectoral arch, and extremities. The author, Gideon Algernon Mantell, examines various fossil remains and provides a restored outline of the skeletal structure of these two colossal reptiles from the Wealden of South-east England.
